snippet: The police arrested a man suspected of cannibalism after they found an infant’s head at his home, and they are searching for the man’s older brother.
abstract: Pakistani police arrest Muhammad Arif, who is suspected of cannibalism after they find an infant's head at his home; Arif and his brother Farman Ali had admitted in 2011 to being cannibals three years ago, and were convicted of defiling bodies, as cannibalism is not a crime in the country.

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The police arrested a man suspected of cannibalism after they found an infant’s head at his home, and they are searching for the man’s older brother.

headline.main: 2 Pakistanis Suspected of Cannibalism After Head Is Found
headline.print_headline: 2 Pakistanis Suspected of Cannibalism After Head Is Found
